attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are no modern day care centers in place for disabled people. a place where they can have the chance to mix and mingle as well as having independence away from their parents/carers! a disability does not mean you are not allowed a life. hope and a warm safe enviroment with a sense od dignity and self worth are important but after education there are no such centers in place. being disabled means living not rotting away waiting to die!!!

rejection.details: Please make your title a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
